changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE users ( id bigserial PRIMARY KEY, name varchar )

changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE groups ( id bigserial PRIMARY KEY, name varchar, parent_id bigint REFERENCES groups(id) )

changeSet.author: vladimir
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE roles ( id bigserial PRIMARY KEY, name varchar )

changeSet.author: vladimir
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE permissions ( id bigserial PRIMARY KEY, name varchar )

changeSet.author: vladimir
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE user_groups ( id bigserial PRIMARY KEY, user_id bigserial REFERENCES users(id), group_id bigserial REFERENCES groups(id) )

changeSet.author: vladimir
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE role_permissions ( id bigserial PRIMARY KEY, permission_id bigserial REFERENCES permissions(id), role_id bigserial REFERENCES roles(id) )

changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE user_roles ( id bigserial PRIMARY KEY, role_id bigserial REFERENCES roles(id), user_id bigserial REFERENCES users(id) )
